            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>Since 2014, CreekWatch has provided the leadership, science, and stewardship necessary for community volunteers to contribute to positive environmental change in their community. We bring people together from all walks of life – scientists and non-scientists from different communities, backgrounds, cultures, and ages allowing them to investigate and act on water issues pertaining to their local stormwater creeks. CreekWatch promotes collaborative, timely, and low-cost water quality monitoring focused on improving our tributary stormwater quality and having participants explore science by making it more familiar, accessible, and inclusive. Adult volunteers work in teams using portable water quality labs to research and answer the question “How healthy are our creeks?”</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

fr: Surveillance des eaux pluviales des affluents
Bassin de la rivière Saskatchewan Nord
Bassin de la rivière Red Deer

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-eko3-u308
notes: Since 2014, CreekWatch has provided the leadership, science, and stewardship necessary for community volunteers to contribute to positive environmental change in their community. We bring people together from all walks of life – scientists and non-scientists from different communities, backgrounds, cultures, and ages allowing them to investigate and act on water issues pertaining to their local stormwater creeks. CreekWatch promotes collaborative, timely, and low-cost water quality monitoring focused on improving our tributary stormwater quality and having participants explore science by making it more familiar, accessible, and inclusive. Adult volunteers work in teams using portable water quality labs to research and answer the question “How healthy are our creeks?”

notes_translated.en: Since 2014, CreekWatch has provided the leadership, science, and stewardship necessary for community volunteers to contribute to positive environmental change in their community. We bring people together from all walks of life – scientists and non-scientists from different communities, backgrounds, cultures, and ages allowing them to investigate and act on water issues pertaining to their local stormwater creeks. CreekWatch promotes collaborative, timely, and low-cost water quality monitoring focused on improving our tributary stormwater quality and having participants explore science by making it more familiar, accessible, and inclusive. Adult volunteers work in teams using portable water quality labs to research and answer the question “How healthy are our creeks?”
notes_translated.fr: Depuis 2014, CreekWatch fournit le leadership, la science et la gérance nécessaires aux bénévoles de la communauté pour contribuer à un changement environnemental positif dans leur communauté. Nous réunissons des personnes de tous horizons, des scientifiques et des non-scientifiques de différentes communautés, origines, cultures et âges, leur permettant d'étudier et d'agir sur les problèmes liés à l'eau liés à leurs ruisseaux d'eaux pluviales locaux. CreekWatch fait la promotion d'une surveillance collaborative, opportune et peu coûteuse de la qualité de l'eau visant à améliorer la qualité des eaux pluviales de nos affluents et à inciter les participants à explorer la science en la rendant plus familière, accessible et inclusive. Des bénévoles adultes travaillent en équipe à l'aide de laboratoires portables de qualité de l'eau pour effectuer des recherches et répondre à la question « Quel est l'état de santé de nos ruisseaux ? »

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: CreekWatch Citizen Science
